_header: In Peblis town sometime as I heard tell
_description: Introduction to the ‘Thre prestis of Peblis’ (79) — 31 couplets

Asloan.First Lines:
In Peblis towne sumtym as I hard tellThe formast daye of februar It
                    befell…
Asloan.Last Lines:
…And I deny þan had Isair offenditThe thing begwn Is
                    þe soner endit
Asloan.Note: = pp. 533-534. Nineteenth-century transcription is Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.IV.28, item 3.
Asloan.Attributed Title:
Heir begynis þe buke of þe thre prestis of peblis how þai
                    tald þar talis (f. 257)
